com.craftar

Class CraftARItemAR

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.craftar.CraftARItem
      • com.craftar.CraftARItemAR

  • public class CraftARItemAR
extends CraftARItem
    CraftARItem that handles an Augmented Reality experience. It may contain one or more instances of CraftARContent
